value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Nu...
$Nu...$k$pGood evening. I must apologize
for this intrusion...$k$pI'm using a special rite to speak with
you while you slumber.$k$pThanks to Embla and Múspell, you've
been drawn into the chaos of war...$k$pI want to do whatever I can, no matter
how small, to help you.$k$pBut how rude of me... I haven't
introduced myself yet.$k$p$WmMPID_スリーズ声,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I am Gunnthrá, eldest princess
of Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice.$k$pDo you know my younger sister,
Fjorm?$k$pShe has a gentle soul, but she...
Well... She has an unfortunate
tendency to agonize over things.$k$pBut I must apologize once again. My
sister is not the reason I wished to
speak with you this evening...$k$pNo, I have some useful information
for you. In the west of Askr, there is
a shrine for the Rite of Awakening.$k$pAnd further west of that...$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And here it is. Another shrine, further
west. It's just as you said it would be,
$Nu.$k$pAnd to think that it was here all along,
none of us the wiser...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|It's uncanny! You know just about
everything, don't you? Tell me a juicy
secret, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|On your guard, everyone. Remember
that this information came from a
voice in a dream...$k$pThere's every chance that this is a
trap laid by our enemies.$k$pProceed with caution. We're going in.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|This shrine really is similar to the one
we explored before. We've already
made it to the depths...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes, it is, isn't it? And look—a stone
slab, just like the one in the other
shrine!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Oh, dear Brother... It's your time to
shine!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm no translator, Sharena, but... Very
well. I'll do what I can to decipher the
text.$k$p$EFace|"Speak not of this rite. Reveal it to
none. Never may these runes be
transcribed. You are so enjoined...$k$p"Find you here a fragment of the Rite
of Awakening for Embla..."$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This writing... It's from the Emblian
Empire? How did this end up here in
Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|"This is a rite of honing. As a stone
sharpens a blade, so do these words.
Tomes, too, are made keener...$k$p"Even 10,000 warriors may not equal
this power in battle...$k$p"Yet it shall remain under seal...$k$p"When the flames, as foretold, lick the
land...Askr the seal shall break."$k$pBeyond that, it's just details on how to
perform the rite.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Well, then. What shall we do,
Commander?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This power may come from our
enemies...but if we use it wisely, it
could help us greatly.$k$p$EFace_Smile|There's no question in my mind. We
must carry this knowledge back to
base and get to work.$k$p$Sbs150|
